name: Galactic Collector
description:
Download Version is available if the browser doesn't work.

Welcome to Galactic Collector, where you collect parts for your ship to become stronger.  Get parts by defeating enemies.

Controls:

USE W TO PROPEL YOUR SHIP FORWARD.
USE A AND D TO ROTATE YOUR SHIP LEFT AND RIGHT.
USE M TO FIRE THE MINIGUNS.
USE K TO FIRE ROCKETS.
USE TAB TO ZOOM OUT.
USE ESCAPE TO PAUSE THE GAME.
